sentences.sContent: Such schemes mean little unless they impact people.
sentences.sCn: 除非能对人们造成影响，否则这样的计划意义不大。

sentences.sContent: ...The recent discovery of the giant Zohr gas field off the Egyptian coast will eventually have impact on pricing in the Mediterranean region and Europe...
...We need very broad participation to fully address global tragedy that results when countries fail to take into account the negative impact of their carbon emissions on the rest of the world...
...the huge impact of new technology on people's everyday life...
...International Labor Organization economists say some nations have come up with policies to lessen the impact of lower wages during the economic crisis...
...they produce more greenhouse gases; and the impact of those gases will fall primarily in poor parts of the world...
...A lot of times people are not really aware of the impact they have...
...we face a series of deadlines that require us to make major decisions about how to pay down our deficit —decisions that will have a huge impact on the economy and the middle class...
...while incurring few of the costs such as climate change's impact on food and water...
...The application of a technology can impact areas beyond itself...
...intending to inform us that the social networks have exerted an important impact on our daily reading...
...Opinions vary when it comes to the impact of social networking websites on reading...
...So there is no surprise that there are different opinions on the impact of social networking websites on reading...
...Studied in social psychology have shown segregation in school education has a negative impact on children...
...The findings of the national survey of college freshmen about the impact of single-sex schooling fail to take into account student and school attributes...
...the process of urbanization will only accelerate in the decades to come — with an enormous impact on biodiversity and potentially on climate change...
...we can reduce urbanization's impact on the environment...
...The rapid expansion of urban areas will have a huge impact on biodiversity hotspots and on carbon emissions in those urban areas...
...What can be done to minimize the negative impact of urbanization according to Seto...
...dramatic impact on real-life arguments...
...Trying to quantify or measure the impact of women in politics is hard because in very few countries have there been enough women in politics to make a difference...
...the impact will extend far beyond agriculture-locking up property rights in an array of important areas...
...what is its impact on you...
...but the theme of the essay should center around its impact on you...
...A further expansion of farming area will adversely impact on the world's natural ecosystems...
...Applicants are asked to describe an ethical dilemma they've faced and its impact on them...
...What was the impact of the poetry session on the program participants according to Professor Filreis...
...Robots continue to have an impact on blue-collar jobs...
...So why is there such a discrepancy between the perception of immigrants' impact on the economy and the reality...
...or California residents – the impact isn't all that dramatic...
...To get a better understanding of what's going on; consider the way immigration's impact is felt...
...Google's entrance into digital bookselling will have a significant impact on the book world in the years to come...
...The core objective for universities which are research-led must be to maximise the impact oftheir research efforts...
...Some hoped his rise to prominence would have a big impact on white Americans...
...and he was making an impact even before he got to the White House...
...It will have more impact on our future than where we decide to set the admissions bar for the latest ware of would-be Americans...

synos.tran: 影响；效果；[物]碰撞；[力]冲击力

phrases.pCn: 对于…有影响；对…造成冲击
视觉冲击，视觉震撼；视觉效果

remMethod.val: 电影《天地大冲撞》的英文名就是Deep Impact

words.tran: 压紧的；结实的；嵌入的；（人口）稠密的

trans.tranCn: 影响， 作用， 冲击
trans.tranOther: to have an important or noticeable effect on someone or something
the effect or influence that an event, situation etc has on someone or something
